Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 7.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
Anna, or Ash you begin with.
Book X Opening

Merged Ordeals:
Special Ordeals that require
Legendary, Mythic, Emblem, or
Chosen Heroes added to the game
since version 8.4 who have also
been merged. Merged Ordeals are
more difficult, and you can earn
600 Dragonflowers from them.

To celebrate the arrival of
Book X, a new castle design
is ready for you to use!

Take a look!
Having checked out the\nRite of Frost Temple design,\ndo you want to use it?
If you change your mind, tap\nUpgrade Castle, then Change\nDesign, then Rite of Frost Temple.
For Tomorrow

$aChosen Unit Effect 1: $a0 Clash
During $a0 season, higher-scoring
opponents will appear in places like the Arena.
(Total stat calculation excludes any values
added by merges and skills and is treated
as $a1.)
(Skills and Sacred Seals are treated as
having the highest SP. When calculating the
highest SP, the SP of non-weapon exclusive
skills is not included.)

Select a target Hero to receive powers.
Note: This Hero can be changed at any time.

Chosen Target Effect 1: Stat Boosts
Grants target Hero stat increases based
on the Chosen Hero's merge count. Every
merge grants the effect of a Dragonflower.
This does not impact how stats influence
opponent selection in modes like Arena.

Chosen Target Effect 2: Powerful Foes
During $a0 season, higher-scoring
opponents will appear in places like the Arena
(calculates score based on the higher of the two
scores between the Chosen Hero and the target
Hero). If target Hero is a Legendary Hero, this
effect is only active if their Legendary
Hero type is $a0.

Chosen Target Effect 3: Boosted in Arena
During $a0 season, if the target Hero
has weapon-triangle advantage, target
deals +20 damage and takes -20 damage
during combat (excluding area-of-effect
Specials for both). If target is colorless, the
target has weapon-triangle advantage against
colorless foes. If target Hero is a Legendary
Hero, this effect is only active if their Legendary
Hero type is $a0.

Chosen Target Effect 4: Blessed in Arena
During $a0 season, if target Hero is not
a Legendary Hero, the target is treated as
having the blessing of the $a0 element,
regardless of their type.

Changes complete.
No Chosen Heroes.
◆Select◆\nChosen Heroes can select a target\nHero to grant special powers.

Chosen Effect - Stat Boosts:
Grants target Hero stat increases
based on the Chosen Hero's
merge count. Every merge grants
the effect of a Dragonflower.
These increases do not impact
how stats influence opponent
selection in modes like Arena.

Chosen Effect - Powerful Foes:
During the Chosen Hero's season,
higher-scoring opponents will
appear in places like the Arena
for the target Hero. The higher
score between the Chosen Hero
and the target Hero will be used
for score calculation.

If target Hero is a Legendary
Hero, this effect is only active if
both the target and the Chosen
Hero's blessing types match.

Chosen Effect - Boosted in Arena:
During the Chosen Hero's season,
the following are active on the
target Hero. If target Hero is a
Legendary Hero, this effect is only
active if both the target and the
Chosen Hero's elements match.

If target Hero has weapon-triangle
advantage, deals +20 damage and
takes -20 damage during combat
(excluding area-of-effect Specials
for both.) If target Hero is colorless,
has weapon-triangle advantage
against colorless foes.

Chosen Effect - Blessed in Arena:
During the Chosen Hero's season,
the target Hero is treated as
though they have the blessing of
the Chosen Hero as well,
regardless of the target's blessing.
(Only for non-Legendary Heroes.)

Note: When the Hero is treated as
having two blessings, the 2× EXP
and SP blessing effects do
not stack.

More Information:
"In Arena" effects apply to Arena,
Arena Assault, and Allegiance
Battles.

More Information:
Chosen effects that have the
following are only active when
you are in control of your units
in places like the Arena:
・ Higher-scoring opponents
・ Target deals more damage

More Information:
Chosen effects only impact the
target Hero. Example: Chosen
Hero A selects Chosen Hero B,
and Hero B selects Hero C.
Hero A's effects do not impact
Hero C; they only impact Hero B.
Rite of Frost Temple
Nine-Realm Model
A model of the World-Tree and the nine realms.\nIt's strange to think you're looking down at the\nentirety of existence. It's an event item.
Chosen-Sword Icon

A model of Alfonse's sword after he took the
will of the world upon his shoulders. Looking at
it incites determination to take on the winter of
annihilation. It's an event item.
Chosen-Spear Icon

A model of Fjorm's spear after she took the will
of the world upon her shoulders. Looking at it
kindles serenity within one's heart to take on
the winter of annihilation. It's an event item.
Frosty Aether Stones
Used in Aether Raids to build structures that\nare available for a limited time. If that period\nhas elapsed, these stones will be lost.
